#summary Adding a new booking when availability exists

== Synopsis ==

Booking received by telephone/walkin for future date. 3 guests 1M, 2F in separate dorm rooms for 3 nights. 10+ beds. Take deposit for 1st night.


== Process ==

  # Click [AddBooking Add Booking]
  # Enter booking name, referrer, (deposit, balance to pay on arrival).
  # 1M allocate to 10 bed resource (tick male only). Click Add.
  # 2F to 10 bed resource (tick female only). Click Add.
  # Click Save.
